name: Arcnia Highlands - Jam Edition
description:
Place your tiles, Build your Kingdom, Prevent the Corruptions from Spreading!

Arcnia Highlands puts you in a fantasy city builder where you must keep all of your tiles connected to try an combat the Corruption that is spreading across the land!

This game was made for the Lost Relic Game Jam of 2022 .

Place tiles next to each other to merge them. 

Merging upgrades tiles and gives you more space. 

Try to place as many tiles as possible before you run out of room. 

But be careful, corrupted tiles spawn after a certain number of rounds.

Developers

Lucas Ballard : Programmer

Gregory Burns : Artist

Cody Bruckerhoff : Personal Rubber Duck to Lucas

Mason Scheible : Morale Support

All family and friends who helped us stay alive!

This title can technically play on mobile, but the experience wasn't tailored for it, it is simply a by product of itch.io's system.
